content:
As an AI language model, I can surely answer your question. 

The DFB-Pokal involves 64 teams every year, which includes all 18 clubs from the Bundesliga, all 18 clubs from the 2. Bundesliga, and 28 teams from the regional leagues as well as a few amateur teams who qualify from preliminary rounds. 

There are a total of six rounds in the DFB-Pokal, with the first round featuring 32 matches, followed by the second round with 16, and the third round with 8. The quarter-finals have 4 matches, the semi-finals have 2 matches, and the final is the last match of the competition between the two remaining teams.
